artist: Painter: After Diego Rodriguez Velazquez; Lithographer: Villain; Printer: Jean Baptiste Mauzaisse
description: bust length portrait; turned left and looking out at viewer; wearing coat with high flat white collar; medallion on tie around neck
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in image in black: Lith de Villain   Mauzaisse | below image in black: VELASQUEZ / d\'apres son portrait par lui-meme | on sheet in pencil: 2-526
title: Portrait of Velasquez
